thread.title: ABQid names new executive director

author: May Ortega
title: ABQid names new executive director
text: Enlarge T.J. Cook has been named as ABQid's new CEO. TJ Cook, formerly CEO of CauseLabs, has been named ABQid's new executive director, according to a press release Wednesday afternoon. He will step into his role on Monday. “ABQid has facilitated an intersection of entrepreneurs, mentorship and seed capital, which is critical to a healthy ecosystem," Cook said in the release. "ABQid has already demonstrated that New Mexico is a great place to build growth businesses. I join an excellent team and am looking forward to democratizing entrepreneurship throughout the city and state.” T.J. Cook has been named as ABQid's new CEO. Cook will be taking over from interim CEO John McDermott . The ABQid business accelerator, a 501(c)3 nonprofit, identifies and develops high-growth potential, scalable startup companies in New Mexico. This is a developing story. Business First will continue to update it. Technology, health care, professional services Industries
